abstract: Pete Wells reviews Indian restaurant Paowalla in SoHo area of Manhattan.

headline.print_headline: A Prodigal Chef Comes Home to India
headline.main: An Indian Chef Comes Home Again at Paowalla in SoHo

snippet: Floyd Cardoz, who won accolades at Tabla, returns to his native cuisine with a menu built around breads....
lead_paragraph: Floyd Cardoz, who won accolades at Tabla, returns to his native cuisine with a menu built around breads.
